mapper.select: SELECT id, name, luggage_id, reg_date FROM xray_images WHERE luggage_id = #{luggageId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO xray_images ( name, reg_date) VALUES (#{imageName}, now())
mapper.select:
SELECT count(*) FROM xray_power_state_log A JOIN xray_info B ON A.xray_id = B.id
AND A.is_on = true AND A.is_on = false AND B.name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{searchText}, '%') AND A.reg_date between date(#{dateStart}) and date(#{dateEnd})+1 AND A.reg_date >= #{dateStart} AND A.reg_date <= #{dateEnd}
